body: At 14th level, a witch hunter gains the following judgment.
name: Witch's Bane Judgment
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Inquisitor/Inquisitor Archetypes/Witch Hunter/Witchs Bane Judgment

sections.body: Any creature that casts an arcane spell within 30 feet of the witch hunter takes a –2 penalty to AC against her attacks and a –2 penalty on saving throws against her spells while this judgment remains in effect. This ability replaces exploit weakness.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Inquisitor/Inquisitor Archetypes/Witch Hunter/Witchs Bane Judgment/Witchs Bane
sections.name: Witch's Bane
